skill.name: Clear Torrent
skill.description:
Deals **331% water damage** to a single enemy and **Dispel 1 Buff** on the target.

Give self **1 stack of Zero Ice Crest** effects, and add **400% water damage** per stack of **Zero Ice Crest.**

After strengthening: Cooldown from **6→5**

skill.name: Midsummer Blessing
skill.description:
Increases the **double attack(35%) & triple attack(25%) activation rate**, **critical Damage (30%)** and gain **1** **Zero Ice Crest**.

If self **Zero Ice Crest** reaches **5 stacks**, will consume 1 stack of **Zero Ice Crest** to gain **30% chase damage.**

After strengthening: when self **Zero Ice Crest** reaches **5 stacks**, will consume 1 stack of **Zero Ice Crest** to gain **10% damage cap increase**.

resonance.name: Midsummer's Paradise
resonance.description:
Deals 320% water attribute damage to all enemies, grants the Midsummer Paradise effect to all allies, and also recovers 500 HP + maximum of 20% HP to all allies.\
If self **Zero Ice Crest** is more than 3 stacks, reset the cool time of the resonance technique "**Clear Torrent**".

After strengthening: Damage increase **400%→450%**

effect.name: Midsummer's Paradise
effect.description: Water attribute attack power +30%, fire attribute defense power +30% (3 turns)

passive.name: Constant QI Clearing Technique
passive.description:
Increase all **critical rate (25%)** of water allies in the party.

After strengthening: When battle begin, give self **3 stack of Zero Ice Crest**.

passive.name: Midsummer Season
passive.description:
When self use bursts, shorten own skill (**Midsummer Blessing**) cooldown by **1**.

When turn end, if self were to receive attack from enemies, gain self **1 stack of Zero Ice Crest**

passive.name: Synchronized Blessing
passive.description: Increase all water allies **bursts damage by 5%** & **bursts** **damage cap increase by 5%**.
